register_verify.msg:
Hi!

Thank you for registering with the SmartDorm Laundry app.

Verification Code: {}

Please do not share this code with anyone to protect your account.

If you have not registered with the SmartDorm Laundry app, please ignore this email.

Thank you for using our app.

Best regards,
The SmartDorm team
register_verify.title: Confirmation of registration in the SmartDorm Laundry application

reset_password.msg:
Hi, {}

You are receiving this email because you have requested to reset your password in the SmartDorm Laundry app. To set a new password, please enter the code below in the app and follow the instructions:

{}

If you have not requested a password reset, please ignore this email.

Best regards,
The SmartDorm Laundry team
reset_password.title: Password Reset
